mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET BOOK_HEADCOUNT=#{bookHeadCount}, ROOM_NUM=#{bookRoomNum}, CHECK_IN=#{checkIn}, CHECK_OUT=#{checkOut}, BOOK_PROCESS=#{bookProcess} WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
